page.title: 06Blakesley Post Office.
page.content: Blakesley P.O.has operated from No.3 OldSchool Lane since 1981.Mail arrives from Towcester at 7am for sorting by two post ladies who make deliveries to Blakesley and Woodend by bicycle.One round is over 9 miles the other,7 miles but with more houses.The Office is open to the public 9am-5pm Mon-Sat.Half-day Wed. It is equipped with a bandit screen and burglar alarm.The service provides: postage stamps,cashing of pensions and allowances,Nat.Savings Postal Orders,TV,Dog and Game licences.Also on sale in the same building: sweets,chocolate,ice cream, pop, dog biscuits,rabbit/hamster food, millet and canary seed,free range eggs, 900 greetings cards,stationery and some D.I.Y. items e.g.hooks,screws and nails.Clothes can be left for dry cleaning which is collected twice weekly.
